pullrequest.title: Add QUIET to find_package() to avoid warnings when ROS not installed.

content.raw:
Interesting point.  That wasn't previously the case when we relied on the manual setting of PKG_CONFIG_PATH.

Please do update the Jenkins scripts, as well other places where that's used or mentioned, which should include:

 *  gazebo-release/ubuntu/debian/rules: currently set PKG_CONFIG_PATH in the configure step; I guess that that should be replaced by sourcing ROS's setup.sh, similar to how we do it drcsim-release
 * http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/Install#Ubuntu_Linux_2 : installation instructions prescribe setting PKG_CONFIG_PATH on the cmake call; should instead source ROS's setup.sh
